reason.description: Reason for response if empty. For example, if channel not found

count.description: Number of messages to consume from this index

signature.description: Source account signature/hash. Can be used by spyder to identify whether the source account data has changed

UpdatePrincipalPermissions.title: Update a set of principals permissions

info.description:
REST API for Onna Platform

# Introduction
The Canonical REST API is the central hub for access and updating data related to Onna.

It is built on top of the [Guillotina](https://guillotina.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) framework, which is a REST Resource API.
info.title: Onna
